column4: Can i have that link again for the instructions on how to install limewire?
at least the latter has a pretty decent searchfunction
try find the executable.. 'sudo updatedb && sudo locate limewire' for example
not sure if you need the second 'sudo'
is there something in /usr/bin or /usr/local/bin that looks like limewire?
naturally replacing the last term by the actual filename :)
there are several ways of installing the JRE
then please stop playing stupid and save us the typing
how long since you left windows again?
